description.name: HipChat
description.tagline: HipChat is a team collaboration and chat tool.
description.long:
HipChat, from Atlassian, was a leading web service for internal private online chat and instant messaging.

In July 2018, Atlassian announced they would be *discontinuing* HipChat in 2019 and as a result, HipChat is no longer accepting new signups. The recommended alternative for notifications is Slack.
